info.title: Media Source Output

media.output.description: This Resource provides the list of output media sources available on the device. The sources are an array of Media Source(s) see Resource Type "oic. r. mediasource"

sourceName.description: Specifies a pre-defined media input or output

sourceType.description: Specifies the type of the source

status.description: Specifies if the specific source instance is selected or not
